question: Looking at the product performance heatmap, which statement below is the most accurate?

options.A: The speed difference between Product A and B exceeds that between Product B and C.
options.B: Product B and C may differ greatly in speed, but discrete color bins mask the difference.
options.C: Product A is clearly faster than Product B, and the color difference accurately represents this performance gap.
options.D: The speed performance difference is impossible to determine from this visualization.

explanation: Product A Speed (78.5) and Product B Speed (80.1) have a 1.6-point difference, while Product B and Product C Speed (88.2) have a 8.1-point difference. However, the categorical color encoding groups B and C into the same color bin (80-90), masking their actual difference, while A and B appear more different due to different color bins.
